Yesterday the IMF report on the Greek economy has been publicized. # Dimopsifisma
The only way to make debt sustainable is to cut by 30% and give a 20-year grace period. #dimopsifisma
This position has never been presented by creditors to the Greek government during the five months of the deal. #dimopsifisma
We all have to be accountable, respect the opposing views and united to face our common future tomorrow
I invite you, therefore, to say #OXI to the ultimatums, extortion, the fear campaign. # NO to the split.
# NO to those who are trying to sow panic & prevent you from deciding calmly & responsible for your own tomorrow #dimopsifisma

I presided over a meeting of the Council of Ministers, which we started by reading Fatihah on the spirit of the nation and the builder of the state and the founder of its revival Sheikh Zayed may Allah have mercy on him http://t.co/RpeNjpHTyE
We also issued today a statement from the Council of Ministers condemning in the strongest terms all manifestations of extremism, terrorism and sectarianism that threaten stability in our Arab world
Today, during the meeting of the Council of Ministers at the Presidential Palace, we decided to establish a new organizational structure for the Ministry of Education http://t.co/ul9K4plu78

In the new structure of the Ministry of Education, we have adopted the establishment of two undersecretaries for the Ministry and six assistant agents to achieve maximum support for the educational field
It also took into account the alleviation of administrative burdens placed on the teacher in the new structure, which was taking a lot of effort and time
Our wishes for the next year is more efficient and flexible .. And the highest ability to meet aspirations to reach a distinctive educational system by the year 2021, God willing
We also discussed today the draft Financial Reorganization and Bankruptcy Law, which will complement our economic legislative system to provide an ideal investment environment
The new law will provide investors with a protection network, safeguard the rights of all parties during economic downturns and provide flexibility in our national economy
We also adopted today a decision to allocate 1% of the federal budget to support innovation in the government sector and make it a daily institutional practice in all quarters
Tusiwasikilize wanasiasa wanaowagawa Watanzania na kutumia fedha kutafuta madaraka. Mchezo wao ni mauti yetu. Wakatalieni kwa macho makavu.
Tusiruhusu wanasiasa kutumia dini ambazo ni mhimili muhimu wa amani yetu. Ukiwepo mfarakano wa kidini hakuna mtu wala eneo litakalonusurika.
Tukiamua kwa utashi wetu kuzipoteza tunu za amani na upendo, katu hatuwezi kusema ni mapenzi ya Mungu bali itakuwa ni makosa yetu wenyewe.
Kiongozi wa dini anapaswa kukumbusha wajibu wa: kujiandikisha, kupiga kura na kuchagua kiongozi bora; si kuwaambia waumini wamchague fulani.
@BernadDotto amina, aksante sana.
The result of the referendum in Greece is a strong signal to all European leaders and the IMF to change their approach.
In the context of the negotiations that must resume, the European and international institutions must stop imposing austerity.
We started today's cabinet session with a reading of Al Fatiha for the late Sheikh Zayed, founding father of UAE http://t.co/WMtb3KCpNZ
Cabinet issued statement strongly condemning all manifestations of extremism, terrorism and sectarianism threatening stability of Arab world
Cabinet also approved today a new organizational structure for Ministry of Education http://t.co/TC8H3J6m8n
Cabinet discussed draft law on financial regulation and bankruptcy. The law will attract more investments & increase flexibility of economy
Draft law aims to ensure support for troubled businesses and create attractive business environment that nurtures & supports investments
We approved a decision to allocate 1% of federal budget to support innovation in public sector, make it daily practice through government
Today's #dimopsifisma has no winners and losers. It is a great victory in itself. #Greece
Even in the most difficult circumstances, democracy is not blackmailed and is a dominant value and a choice of way out. # Greece #dimopsifisma
I want to thank everyone & each of you separately. No matter what you chose, this evening we are all one
The mandate you give me is not a rupture order with Europe but a mandate to strengthen our negotiating power. #Greece #dimopsifisma
We know that there are no easy solutions. However, there are fair solutions. There are viable solutions. It is a matter for both sides
With his historic and courageous choice, the Greek people responded to the right question and at the same time changed the question of dialogue in Europe
The Greek people today answered the question: What Europe do we want. And he replied: We want a Europe of solidarity and democracy.
Our immediate priority is to quickly restore our banking system and our financial stability.
This time on the negotiating table will be the issue of debt, how much even when the IMF itself in its report admits it
This time, the place needs more than ever unity and coherence, unity and sincere understanding to overcome the difficulties.
Immediately afterwards, I will visit the President of the Republic and ask him tomorrow morning to convene the Political Leaders Council. #Greece
Today we celebrate the victory of democracy. From tomorrow we all together continue & complete the National effort for a route agreement.
With a strong ally the faith of our people in his powers. With a strong ally of democracy and the right that is on our side. #Greece
I have called a #EuroSummit Tuesday evening at 18h to discuss situation after referendum in #Greece
